body_html: @fmassa Oh yes, of course you are right. I misread and thought this is also about refactor so interpolate methods also share some code with grid_sample (which is sill a good eventual goal though). Although, if we are going to "start roughly 'from scratch'" anyways, I'd prefer the new refactor to be rewritten in ATen. What do you think?

body: @fmassa Oh yes, of course you are right. I misread and thought this is also about refactor so `interpolate` methods also share some code with `grid_sample` (which is sill a good eventual goal though). Although, if we are going to "start roughly 'from scratch'" anyways, I'd prefer the new refactor to be rewritten in ATen. What do you think?
